DESCRIPTION: Creates uniform offset from feature at set distance.
EXAMPLE USE: VISUALIZE TREE PROTECTION ZONE, EASEMENTS, CONTEXTUAL DISTANCE RADIUS, ETC.

DESCRIPTION: Measures distance to nearby features or connects features based on proximity.
EXAMPLE USE: Show nearest public transit stops, schools, or parks for a development.

DESCRIPTION: Combines layers to find areas of overlap or exclusion.
EXAMPLE USE: Identify parts of a site inside a flood zone and with proper zoning.

DESCRIPTION: Calculates steepness of terrain.
EXAMPLE USE: Identify buildable vs. unbuildable areas. Estimate grading needs.

DESCRIPTION: Determines compass direction slopes face.
EXAMPLE USE: Orient buildings for optimal daylight or passive solar heating.

DESCRIPTION: Shows visible areas from a given point or height.
EXAMPLE USE: Test scenic impact of a tall building or evaluate privacy concerns.

DESCRIPTION: Places buildings and terrain into a 3D environment.
EXAMPLE USE: Present building massing, shadow studies, or skyline impacts.

DESCRIPTION: Calculates visibility outward from a point. Based on Terrain + 3D data layers.
EXAMPLE USE: Is the river visible from the third floor Amenity Deck?' 3D Output.

DESCRIPTION: Calculates visibility outward from a point. Based on Terrain + 3D data layers.
EXAMPLE USE: Is the river visible from the third floor Amenity Deck?' 2D Output.

DESCRIPTION: Calculates travel time/distance within a network.
EXAMPLE USE: Display 5, 15, 30 minute walk range from site.

DESCRIPTION: Finds statistically significant clusters of high or low values.
EXAMPLE USE: Identify high-demand rental areas or traffic incident clusters.

DESCRIPTION: Calculates sunlight exposure over a year.
EXAMPLE USE: Optimize roof orientation for solar panels or daylighting.

DESCRIPTION: Uses elevation data to model terrain, trees, and buildings.
EXAMPLE USE: Analyze tree canopy height or topographic detail for site grading.

DESCRIPTION: Ranks areas based on multiple weighted criteria.
EXAMPLE USE: Select the best parcel based on slope, zoning, and proximity to transit.

DESCRIPTION: Impact of proposed building on shadows cast upon a specific area/feature.
EXAMPLE USE: How will the new building cast shadows on the nearby homes.

DESCRIPTION: Monochrome image emphasizing high elevation areas.
EXAMPLE USE: Can help with topographic comprehension. Works well as overlay to emphasize terrain in Site Plans.

DESCRIPTION: Convert Digital Elevation Model into contour lines.
EXAMPLE USE: Can be extracted as linework to create a site mesh in Rhino.

DESCRIPTION: Animate temporal data with a draggable timeline.
EXAMPLE USE: Display project phases over time.

DESCRIPTION: View BIM Model among context. Can be combined with 3D GIS data.
EXAMPLE USE: WALKTHROUGH MODEL IN CLIENT MEETING, HOST ON CLIENT SITE FOR MARKETING, ETC. NOTE: BIM MODEL MUST BE PROCESSED AS IF READY TO 3D PRINT, CANNOT BE QUICKLY UPDATED.

DESCRIPTION: View zonal data with extrusion linked to a chosen field.
EXAMPLE USE: Population density per neighborhood.
